price: (22) They said, "Have you come to delude us away from our gods? Then bring us what you promise us, if you should be of the truthful."
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا لِتَأۡفِكَنَا عَنۡ ءَالِهَتِنَا فَأۡتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qālū aji'tanā litafikanā ʿan ālihatinā fatinā bimā taʿidunā in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
